[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [Reconfig subscription race] Can reconfig subscriptions trigger before services are ready, causing undefined behavior during epoch transitions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [Network interface isolation] Are network interfaces properly isolated per service, or can one compromised service access another's network channels? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [Peers metadata manipulation] Can peers_and_metadata be tampered with to inject fake validators or manipulate peer discovery? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [Mempool listener bypass] Can mempool_listener be exploited to inject transactions that bypass validation or gas checks? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [Consensus notifier manipulation] Can consensus_notifier be abused to send fake commit notifications causing state sync corruption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/lib.rs] [Function: setup_environment_and_start_node()] [API port hijacking] Can api_port_tx be manipulated to report incorrect API ports causing clients to connect to malicious servers? (High)
